description:
os: sleep 5ms after process has exited on windows

Fixes issue 2866.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8f3e1234e25b ***

os: sleep 5ms after process has exited on windows

Fixes issue 2866.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5719047

LGTM

s/BUG/NOTE/

Top-level BUG comments are shown in godoc (like
http://weekly.golang.org/pkg/runtime/pprof/#bugs).
Inside a function they should have no meaning, but
even so, it might be best to avoid them.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 5719047: os: sleep 5ms after process has exited on windows
